title: Combining Interactive and Automatic Volume Registration Techniques in Tomviz
content: Tomviz is a cross-platform, open source tool for the visualization and analysis of tomography data [1]. Built on top of the industry-leading open source visualization platforms ParaView [2] and VTK [3], Tomviz provides state-of-the-art rendering techniques and a broad collection of tools for image processing such as tilt image alignment, tomographic reconstruction, histograms, filters, user-customized Python scripts, and many researcher-contributed algorithms.
